sentences.english: Dylan, Berlin, Bay of Pigs invasion.
sentences.chinese: 鮑勃迪倫，柏林，豬灣事件。

sentences.english: I thought I knew how President Kennedy felt after the Bay of Pigs.
sentences.chinese: 我想我瞭解到了肯尼迪總統在豬灣事件後的感受。

sentences.english: In public, the president said he was responsible for the failure of the Bay of Pigs invasion.
sentences.chinese: 在公開場合，布什總統說，他負責的豬灣入侵失敗。

sentences.english: My whole operation was a romantic Bay of Pigs.
sentences.chinese: 我整個計劃就像豬灣事件的浪漫版。
